recipe.ingredients: - rolled oats: 1 cup - water: 2 cups - fresh mixed berries (blueberries, raspberries, strawberries): 1 cup - chia seeds: 1 tablespoon - unsweetened almond milk: 1/2 cup - vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon - cinnamon powder: 1/2 teaspoon - optional sweetener (stevia or erythritol): to taste
recipe.directions: 1. Cook Oats: In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add the rolled oats and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the oats are soft and have absorbed most of the water. 2. Add Flavors: Stir in the vanilla extract, cinnamon powder, and optional sweetener. 3. Serve with Toppings: Pour the cooked oats into a bowl. Top with fresh mixed berries and chia seeds. Drizzle unsweetened almond milk over the top. 4. Enjoy: Enjoy your berry oat breakfast bowl hot, perfect for starting the day nutritiously.
